verses.name: 2 Kings 4:13
verses.text: And he said unto him, Say now unto her, Behold, thou hast been careful for us with all this care; what is to be done for thee? wouldest thou be spoken for to the king, or to the captain of the host? And she answered, I dwell among mine own people.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:14
verses.text: And he said, What then is to be done for her? And Gehazi answered, Verily she hath no child, and her husband is old.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:15
verses.text: And he said, Call her. And when he had called her, she stood in the door.
